body_html: Hello! I was trying to sign in on the Teams App as a mentor, but am unable to do so and even if my team tries to add me as a coach, I do not receive a confirmation. Must have something to do with leaving the profile un-filled at the beginning. Please let me know if there is a workaround to this? This is the message displayed every time I try to login with no confirmation email being received.
body_text: Hello! I was trying to sign in on the Teams App as a mentor, but am unable to do so and even if my team tries to add me as a coach, I do not receive a confirmation. Must have something to do with leaving the profile un-filled at the beginning. Please let me know if there is a workaround to this? This is the message displayed every time I try to login with no confirmation email being received.
body:
Hello! I was trying to sign in on the Teams App as a mentor, but am unable to do so and even if my team tries to add me as a coach, I do not receive a confirmation. Must have something to do with leaving the profile un-filled at the beginning. Please let me know if there is a workaround to this? This is the message displayed every time I try to login with no confirmation email being received.
